channel.title: Getting your client to recognize pic
channel.description: How do you get your client to recognize your picture for background its been a while since i did it soz =\

item.title: Getting your client to recognize pic
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

copy the picture that your using and then go into sprites find the old background right click on it and click edit it should bring paint up delete the old one and paste click ctrl+s= save and then compile or whatever and then open client it should work, worked for me. Oh and you cant have your client in use whilst your doing this.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting your client to recognize pic
